content:
Dyuthithan suthare!-vegamunarnneeduvin
lokam rakshippaan sadayam
Peedakallettonaam-naathhane vaazhtthiduvin.

Ninmaathaavaam-kanyakamariyaamin
Praarththhanayaal kartthaave-nin
Kurishaal rakshithamaam-sabhayil kaniyenam.

Nibishleehanmaar-sahaderennivar than
Praarththhanayaal kartthaave! Nin
Kurishaal rakshithamaam-sabhayil kaniyenam.

Yaathanayettoraa-sahadenmaar than
Praarththhanayaal kartthaave! Nin
Kurishaal rakshithamaam-sabhayil kaniyenam.

Shobhana charithan thommaashleehaa than
Praarththhanayaal kartthaave! Nin
Kurishaal rakshithamaam sabhayil kaniyenam.

Sthothram jagathi-rakshakane! Ninne
Preshippichonaam thaathan
Bahumaanyan roohaa-vandyan sthuthyaarhan.

(velllliyaazhcha raathri praarththhanayile onnaam kaumaaykku vi. Daivamaathaavin്rethum vi. Sleebaayudethumaayi, randu kaumaakall thaazhe nalkiyirikkunnu. Ithil koodoshu eetthomuthal uyirppu nyaayaraazhchavareyulllla kaalatthu vi. Daivamaathaavin്rethum, uyirppu nyaayaraazhcha muthal koodaasha eetthovareyulllla kaalatthu vi. Sleebaayudethum praarththhana chollanam. Uyirppu muthal koodoshu eettho vare raathri praarththhanayude naalaam kaumaayile kukkiliyon samayatthu vi. Daivamaathaavinte kukkiliyonum kolokallum koodi nadatthikkollllendathaakunnu.)

Aardrathayaalellaam-srshdikkunnon than
Maathaavaam kanni-thanne nyaan vaazhtthum
Purusha vezhchavinaa avall garbhiniyaayi
/tsuthane prasavichaall beejam koodaathe
Athbhuthavathi pettaall-athbhuthamaayone
Durgrahamikkaaryam-haa! Vijnyanmaarkkum

Jagadeeshan than janiyithri-mariyaamminum
Dhanyanibishleehanmaarkkum-sahadenmaarkkum
Aadaamin sutharaam sabhathan-makkallkkellaam
Ulkrshdasmrthiyundaaka-ttennennekkum.

Kanyakayaam mariyaameennu-lllludayatthaale
Maargam thettiya jaathikalle rakshichone!
Sthuthimaathyasmrthi valuthaakkiya daivaathmajane!
Mariyaamin praarththhana sharanam nyangallkkennum.

Dhanye! Nin praarththhanamevatte nyangallodonni-
Charththhana kettittekeedatte punyam naathhan.

Bhaagyavathi mariyaame! Bhaagyam nin dehikkum
Sarvvanmaar than bhaagyatthilumeebhaagyam shreshdham
Goodhaamgyatthaal dharaye vahikkum dheeran thanne
Paithalineppolaashleshicholl neeye dhanya-

Thejojeevaksheeram nalkum sthanamaayone
Sthanyam nalkippottiyoramme! Neeye dhanya
Bhoomiyilengum sangkeertthithamaam ninnudeyormma
Ghoshikkunnu sutharum nararum neeye dhanya.

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam.

Kanden sleebaamoo-nnanyonyam bhinnam
Jeevanezhum valamaam-sleebaa mrthamalla  mrthiyaarnnoridatthe-sleebaaykkuyirilla
/tmaddhyagatham sleebaa vismayamullavaakki
Nidrithanunarvullllon-mrthanaamuyirullllon
Marthyanusamamennaal-saakshaal Daivam thaan.

Sleebaaye vandippaanaay-heleni raajnyi
Nrpapattanamaam romayil ninnerushalemaarnnu
/tyoodanmaare-kootti chonnevam
/tkaanichiduvin sleebaa vachoridam
Nyangallkkundoru pramukhan nee yavanodaaraanyaal
Mashihaathan sleebaayamarum sthhaanam kaanikkum
/thaale...Ennavaruracheythu.

Ammaanuvel deveshan-tharuvil thoongi
Ilshaadaayu thanayan veeran thalathaazhtthi marichu
/taathmam maathram-tharuvil kaivittu
/tnijasaaraamsham-meniyil nivasichu
Verpettaan nissaaramathaam maanushamaam jeevan
Vilapicheedattunnathane krooshichor yoodar
/thaale.....Kashdamavarkkennum.

Sleebaayaale thansabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Shaino nalkitthal suthare nee rakshichaalum.

Veerodu yoodaa dhairyasametham khananam cheyke
Onnodonnaayu sleebaa moonnaakkuzhiyil kandu.
Daivasuthan than sleebaayethennariyaanyettam
Raajaavin maathaavaayeedum helani kenu.

Prethatthinmeloronnum vachaartthaarevam
'o sleebaaye! Kaatteedaname nin maahaathmyam'
Haa! Mrthanaayon sleebaa darshichudanezhunnettu
Kaanikallellaam jeevapradane paaram vaazhtthi.

Daivathanoojaa! Valabhaagatthe moshdaavinmel
Nee krpa cheythu nyangallude melum krpa cheyyenam.

Sodarare! Varuvin-parishuddhanmaar than
Ormmayilonnaake-than naathhane vaazhtthaam
Udayon lokatthil-paarppikkum shaanti
/tnirmmala samghatthil cherkkum nammeyum
Thanmahimaavudayam cheyyum divasatthil
Nammallumaanirayil avanekkeertthikkum.

Sahadenmaar thannasthhikallee-nnuyarum dhoopam
Paramonnatha raajaadheesha-nnetti modam
Eerenmaaraadheerathayil santoshichu
Thirusabhayum sutharum perunnaall-kondaadunnu.

Sahaderthannasthhikallinnaall-modikkatte
Perunnaall kondaadum sabhayum-modikkatte
Mashihaa raajaavinvaravil-sahaderellaam
Aanandapradamanavarayil-pookum noonam.

Snehitharaam sahadenmaar than
Praarththhanayaal krpa cheyyaname
Nyangallkkum mrtharaayorkkum
Nairmmalyam nalkeedenam.

Sahadenmaarekkonnamgam
Chhedichoraa ramgatthil
Roohkkudishaa naasham neekki
Samsthhaapichaan nal shaanti

Sahadenmaar santaapattho
Daathmajane vaazhtthippaadi
Thal perunnaall thannil sabhayum
Sutharum sthothram paadunnu.

Snehitharaam sahadenmaar than
Praarththhanayaal krpa cheyyaname
Nyangallkkum mrtharaayorkkum
Nairmmalyam nalkeedenam.

Parishuddhanmaar than-desham parudeesaa
Neethiparanmaar than-geham parudeesaa
onuvaayanmaar than-bhavanam parudeesaa
/tshaashvathamaayeedum jeevan parudeesaa
Naasham theendaattho-rarathaan parudeesaa
Parudeesaanedum-manujan dhanyan thaan

Pethgomo-thuna ekuka rakshakanaam naathhaa! Haa...
Aadaam chonnaanenneppari rakshikkenam
Havvaayum sarppavumenne-pporil veezhtthi
Kani thinnukayaalaparaadham-cheythonaamen
Mahimaavin vasanavumayyo poyppoyallo

Dushdanadharmmachangalayaa-lennechutti
Kettappetten nedunaallaay-nyaan paapatthaal
Nin krpayennamgangallil ni-nnen kartthaave!
Paapatthin changalayellaam-chhedikkenam

Paartthaalavasaramithuthanne maarthommaa (shleehaa)!
Ninnidavaka thannethaavaayu praarththhikkename.
Nin madhurasthuthi nukarumori-janasamghatthe
Valathukaratthaal moshasamam-vaazhttheedenam.

Sthothram maarthommaa! Ninne-kaikkondaanaam
Janakannum maanichonaam-thanayan perkkum
Vandyan mudiyaniyicheedum-paavanaroohaa nyangallodalivereedatte nin praarththhanayaal.

Maathrvishuddhasmrthi sambandham nalkuka naathhaa!
Thalpraarththhanayaal punyamivarkkum mrtharaayorkkum.

Than raajyatthinnantamathillennaavidhi naathhan
Doothan maargam kanyakamariyaaminu vellivaakki
Doothan mariyaamennivarudeyidu divyarahasyam
Thookkiyirippoo vismayakaramaayu tharuvinmeethe.

Mashihaaraajan kurishil kayari rakshayudichu
Bandhithamaayoradimatthatthinnunarvundaayi
Chonnaanevam varuvin mrthare! Rakshaye nedin
Ningalluyirkkaan nyaan mrthanaayennundoru vaarttha.
